name: Treacle
description: The Treacle is a tiny, gelatinous ooze with a soft and plush texture. It can change its shape into familiar objects or creatures, deceiving passersby.
memorable: Its ability to drain blood while remaining hidden makes it a unique and stealthy ambusher.
goals: The Treacle aims to remain undetected and drain the blood from unsuspecting victims.
relations: The Treacle can be found with other low-level creatures and may serve as an ambusher in various environments.
environment: Typically found in tight spaces or areas where it can blend in with objects.
strengths: Possesses good mobility with Amorphous ability, allowing it to slip through narrow gaps.
weaknesses: Lacks offensive power, relying on stealth and deception for effectiveness.
attacks: Uses Blood Drain to attach to its target and siphon hit points gradually.
most_powerful_ability: Mimic Innocence allows it to transform into non-threatening shapes, tricking adventurers.
senses: Has blindsight out to 120 feet, enabling it to navigate without sight.
skills: Has proficiency in Deception, allowing it to effectively trick creatures.
additional_information: Blindsight allows it to perceive its environment without sight.
Can mimic animal sounds to deceive other creatures.
Slow movement speed makes it reliant on ambush tactics.
Can remain in disguise for up to 8 hours.
Low passive Perception makes it unaware of surroundings.
test_queries: ambushing ooze with blood drain ability
